front.title: RTP Payload Format for Standard apt-X and Enhanced apt-X Codecs

abstract.t: This document specifies a scheme for packetizing Standard apt-X, or Enhanced apt-X, encoded audio data into Real-time Transport Protocol (RTP) packets. The document describes a payload format that permits transmission of multiple related audio channels in a single RTP payload, and a means of establishing Standard apt-X and Enhanced apt-X connections through the Session Description Protocol (SDP).
